response.overview: EDUARDO, a piano teacher deeply attracted to his student GABRIELA, plans to declare himself in the last class. But she will change everything when she confesses that she has taken these classes to tell him that he is her father. Eduardo finds it difficult to assume a role as a father, creating a gap between them, but the grief for Gabriela's deceased mother will bring them closer to find a path.
response.title: Prólogo y epílogo
